sub_title: Translator Dutch - Russian,  English - Russian, owner of  Russisch vertaalbureau Galla
summary:
Are you looking for a translator Russian? I will be pleased to help you!      I am committed to the highest quality of translation and I meet always the project deadline. In addition, I pay special attention to localization of the translation to the target market and the target audience. 
My international business clients can always count on my free advice concerning Russian culture, traditions and business norms.
